questions.question: How many prismatic joints does a scotch yoke mechanism have?
How many revolute joints does a scotch yoke mechanism have?
Scotch Yoke Mechanism is an inversion of ?
Velocity of an object whose displacement is varying with time can be found by?

answers.a: Differentiating the displacement function with respect to time once
answers.b: Integrating the displacement function with respect to time once
answers.c: Differentiating the displacement function with respect to time twice
answers.d: Integrating the displacement function with respect to time twice

answers.a: changing link lengths in kinematic linkage to get same motion
answers.b: changing the kinematic pairs in kinematic linkage e.g. from revolute to prismatic
answers.c: fixing different links in the kinematic linkage
